title: Google weather card disappeared for 2 months
content:
Hi
When I but Google phone . I had Google weather card  alaways.but from about 2 months ago I missed Google weather card.
i did everything to bring it back but I couldn't. One day I changed my phone language from English to persian langauge and suddenly saw it came back.
i had it for some days and was very stable ( didn't disappeare) and was exact ( refresh automatically and was on top of the other cards).
I changed my language from persian to English again and saw it disappeared.
i tried to bring it back but couldn't.
i saw it once but had it just for some minutes and again disappeared and didn't come back.
i tried it several time and every time was like thing I said.
i don't know what is it's mistake. In Persian language show weather card but in English language doesn't show it.
I searched about it but couldn't find reason and solution for it.
I like Google weather card.it is very usable for me and I use to my phone language be English.
I said about this mistake to an Google expert.but he said me to tell  this mistake to you.i said it once to you before but up to now I have this mistake and don't get any answer or solution.
 can you guide me? Is this mode normal for Google and Google weather card?
 Can I can fix it and how?
I will be very happy if u give me a hand about this mistake.
I  will wait for your answer.
Thx
